definition: RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia
ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.chinese: 《泰坦尼克号》获得14项提名和11个小金人。

sentences.english: This maiden voyage of Titanic must make headlines.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克号的处女航必须成为头版头条。

sentences.english: It is a fictionalized account of the sinking of the RMS Titanic.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部根据RMS泰坦尼克号沉没改编的小说。

sentences.english: The story of the " unsinkable " luxury liner Titanic has fascinated people for nearly a century.
sentences.chinese: 人们对永不沉没的泰坦尼克号豪华轮着迷近一个世纪。

sentences.english: Location. Titanic De Luxe Beach and Resort Hotel is located near Antalya, Turkey.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克号海滩度假酒店临近土耳其的安塔利亚。

sentences.english: Four days after the Titanic set out, a very big iceberg floated towards her.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克号出发四天以后，一座巨大的冰山向它漂来。
泰坦尼克号开始往下沉。

sentences.english: She said it was like the Titanic going down—people screaming and yelling.
sentences.chinese: 她说，像泰坦尼克号正在下沉，人们大吵大闹。

sentences.english: Where can I watch Titanic movie online free full stream?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪里可以在线观看免费电影泰坦尼克号全速？

sentences.english: I like epic movies like Titanic.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢《泰坦尼克号》这样的诗史片。

sentences.english: Of course there are enough lifeboats. Don't be frightened by Titanic.
sentences.chinese: 当然有足够的救生船，别被《泰坦尼克号》吓坏了。

sentences.english: The Titanic sunk on their maiden voyage in 1912 by a tragic accident.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦尼克号沉没于1912年在其处女航的悲惨事故。

definition: RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912 (Tw)/PRC equivalent: 泰坦尼克號|泰坦尼克号[Tai4 tan3 ni2 ke4 Hao4]

pinyin: Zheng3 jiu4 Da4 bing1 Rui4 en1

definition: Brokeback Mountain, 2005 English-language film by Ang Lee 李安[Li3 An1]
to premiere (a movie or TV show)/premiere (of a movie)/first-run (movie)/to greet (the eye) before anything else (e.g. when entering a room)
